REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1302 reute r f BC-BLINDER-INTERNATIONAL 03-19 0057

TEXT.TITLE: BLINDER INTERNATIONAL <BINLC> LOANS 4 MLN DLRS
TEXT.BODY: Blinder International Enterprises Inc said it will loan four mln dlrs to Cattle Baron Inc, a subsidiary of Source Venture Capital <SOR>. The loan will be used to contruct the Cattle Baron casino and restaurant to be located in Henderson, Nev., the company said. Reuter
